metadata.title: CVE-2019-7700 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: A heap-based buffer over-read was discovered inwasm::WasmBinaryBuilder::visitCall in wasm-binary.cpp in Binaryen 1.38.22.A crafted wasm input can cause a segmentation fault, leading todenial-of-service, as demonstrated by wasm-merge.

criterions.comment: binaryen package in oracular is affected and needs fixing.
